text: Making this website has been a huge wake-up call for how important it is to do projects as a demonstration of knowledge and as a tool to continue learning in unique ways. As of today, I do not have any personal projects to post here, nor do I have relevant work experience. Furthermore, my classroom projects excluding the ones finishing up now this quarter are stuck in local folders on my old computer that is currently in San Francisco. However, I will be working on projects in Spring quarter and working with data in my internship this summer, so check back here in 6 months for a catalog of data science projects!

title: Taig Lonergan
text:
Hello! My name is Taig and I am a senior at UCLA majoring in both Economics and Statistics & Data Science. I graduate in December of 2024 and am excited to begin my professional journey in the intersection of business and data science. This summer I embark on the next step in my career as a Business Analyst intern for CarMax in Richmond, Virginia. Attached is my current resume for anyone interested.
Outside of the lecture halls, I am President of Special Olympics at UCLA and serve as Treasurer of the UCLA Men’s Club Soccer team. I enjoy living an active and healthy lifestyle, which includes cooking, running, and playing soccer with anyone and everyone. I am a lifelong Manchester United fan and you can find me at 7am on most Saturday mornings watching us lose to a team in the relegation zone.
Feel free to explore this website to learn more about me personally, academically, and professionally!
